thread.section_title: DWIdigitalcameras.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DWIdigitalcameras.com.au | www.dwidigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: Lindsay Arno

author: Lindsay Arno
title: Lindsay Arno
text: Thank you once again DWI for your prompt and reliable service. My latest purchase was despatched the same day as the funds cleared, and if not a mistake on my behalf (incomplete address) then i would have received it within 3 days. I called the courier company in Australia and sorted out my Address on Friday and the item was delivered on Monday as arranged between myself and the courier company (Toll Priority). Once again great service DWI.
